name: 坑窑

pages.text: A pit kiln is an early game method of $(l:mechanics/heating)heating$() items up. It can be used to $(thing)fire$() clay into ceramic, for example. The pit kiln, over the time period of about eight hours, will heat its contents up to 1400 °C, or $(bold)$(e)$(t:Yellow White)Yellow White$().

搭建坑窑前，你需要准备：$(br)$(li)最多 4 个想要加热的物品。$(li)8 束$(thing)干草$()$(li)8 根$(thing)原木$()$(li)$(l:getting_started/firepit#firestarter)起火器$()，或$(thing)火把$()等能生火的物品。$(br2)$(bold)备注：$()想要用火把生火，只需将火把丢在搭建好的坑窑上再等一会儿就可以了。

如何搭建坑窑：$(br2)$(bold)1. $()挖一个 1x1 的坑，按$(item)$(k:tfc.key.place_block)$()将你想烧制的物品放置在其中。$(br)$(bold)2. $()将 8 束$(thing)干草$()放置到坑窑内（应完全覆盖要烧制的物品）。$(br)$(bold)3. $()用 8 根$(thing)原木$()把坑窑填满。$(br)$(bold)4. $()点燃坑窑！$(br2)坑窑将会燃烧 8 个小时，慢慢地$(l:mechanics/heating)加热$()里面的物品。
